Name: Ninja Kiwi Archive
About the game: Ninja Kiwi Archive collects some of the best-loved Flash games from the Ninja Kiwi website in one amazing archival package. Enjoy your favorite Ninja Kiwi games and discover hidden gems from over 14 years of more awesomer, preserved in their original state even after browsers stop supporting Flash. An awesome collection of 60+ classic web games, stored in a time capsule. Experience the forerunners to iconic games like Bloons TD 6. Play the Flash version of popular Steam games like Bloons TD 5, Bloons Monkey City, Bloons TD Battles and SAS: Zombie Assault 4. Log in to your Ninja Kiwi account and reclaim your progress and save games from the web. Enjoy the best single and multiplayer Flash game experiences!
